titleStmt.title: Mrs. Jame's defence of the Church of England, in a short answer to the canting address &c. with a word or two concerning a Quakers good advice to the Church of England, Roman Catholick, and Protestant dissenter.
titleStmt.author: James, Elinor.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Elinor James. cf. BM.
